model_specification: U_accept = split_self - alpha * max((token_self / (token_self + token_opp)) * combined_earning - split_self, 0) - beta * max(split_self - (token_self / (token_self + token_opp)) * combined_earning, 0)
model_summary: The model computes the utility of accepting an offer by comparing the monetary offer to a fair share, defined as the proportionate share of the combined earning based on pre-task tokens. Two earnable parameters—alpha for disadvantageous inequality and beta for advantageous inequality—penalize deviations from fairness. This captures responders’ fairness-driven preferences while relying solely on observed variables.
